title: Unlucky buyer purchases external Seagate HDD, gets an SD card glued inside a plastic shell
summary: An unfortunate user on Reddit bought a 1TB Seagate Backup Plus Slim external hard drive, only to find out that they've been scammed. Inside the enclosure was an SD card for storage, with metal blocks attached to a fake weight.
